member.name: T:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidFrameException
member.summary: The exception is thrown when a frame is corrupt.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidPaddingException
member.summary: The exception is thrown when the amount of padding doesn't match the space left over at the end of the ID3V2 tag.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidPaddingException.Measured
member.summary: the number of zero bytes actually found between the last frame in the id3v2 tag, and the first non-zero byte of audio.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidPaddingException.Specified
member.summary: the amount of space between the last frame in the id3v2 tag, and the specified end of the tag block.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidPaddingException.Message
member.summary: overrides default message with a specific "Padding is corrupt" one

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidStructureException
member.summary: The exception is thrown when some component of an mp3 file is permanently corrupt. Re-reading the file will always give you the same error, as opposed to I/O or permission errors that can be usefully retried.
member.remarks: "Exceptions should be marked [Serializable]" http://www.codeproject.com/KB/architecture/exceptionbestpractices.aspx#Exceptionsshouldbemarked[Serializable]22

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Exceptions.InvalidTagException
member.summary: The exception is thrown when the tag is corrupt.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Exceptions.TagNotFoundException
member.summary: The exception is thrown when the tag is missing.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase
member.summary: Abstract base frame that provides common functionality to all the frames.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.TagAlter
member.summary: Get or set the tag alter flag
member.remarks: This flag tells the tag parser what to do with this frame if it is unknown and the tag is altered in any way. the frames.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.FileAlter
member.summary: Get or set the file alter flag
member.remarks: This flag tells the tag parser what to do with this frame if it is unknown and the file, excluding the tag, is altered.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.ReadOnly
member.summary: Get or set the read only flag
member.remarks: This flag, if set, tells the software that the contents of this frame are intended to be read only.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.Compression
member.summary: Get or set the compression flag.
member.remarks: This flag indicates whether or not the frame is compressed.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.Encryption
member.summary: Get or set the encryption flag.
member.remarks: This flag indicates whether or not the frame is encrypted.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.Unsynchronisation
member.summary: Get or set the un-synchronisation flag.
member.remarks: This flag indicates whether or not un-synchronisation was applied to this frame.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.DataLength
member.summary: Get or set the data length.
member.remarks: This flag indicates that a data length indicator has been added to the frame.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase.Group
member.summary: Get or set the group, if undefined there is no grouping enabled.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBinary
member.remarks: The FrameBinary class handles GEOB ID3v2 frame types that can hold any type of file or binary data encapsulated.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameFullText
member.summary: Manages unsynchronised lyrics and comment frames.
member.remarks: Text encoding $xx Language $xx xx xx Content descriptor text string according to encoding, $00 (00) Lyrics/text full text string according to encoding

member.summary: Get or set the type of text encoding the frame is using.

member.summary: Get or set the main text data.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameFullText.Language
member.summary: Get or set the Language the main text uses.

member.summary: Types of images (technically you can have a picture of each type in a single file)

member.summary: Get the number of times the song has been played

member.remarks: The purpose of this frame is to specify how good an audio file is.

member.summary: The rating is 1-255 where 1 is worst and 255 is best. 0 is unknown.

member.summary: Get the number of times the song has been played

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameText
member.remarks:
The FrameText class handles the frames of text information these are often the most important frames, containing information like artist, album and more. There may only be one text information frame of its kind in an tag.
Text encoding $xx Information text string(s) according to encoding

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameText.TextCode
member.summary: Get or set the type of text encoding, the frame is using.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.FrameText.Text
member.summary: Get or Set the text of the frame

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Frames.IFrameDescription
member.remarks: Frames that have a description must include this interface, it will be used to make a validation that the frames are unique by description;

member.name: P:Id3Lib.Frames.IFrameDescription.Description
member.summary: Description of the frame, it means different things on the specific frame.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.TagExtendedHeader
member.remarks: The extended header contains information that can provide further insight in the structure of the tag, but is not vital to the correct parsing of the tag information; hence the extended header is optional.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagExtendedHeader.Size
member.summary: Get the size of the extended header

member.summary: Load the ID3 extended header from a stream
member.param: Binary stream containing a ID3 extended header

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagExtendedHeader.Serialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Save the ID3 extended header from a stream
member.param: Binary stream containing a ID3 extended header

member.summary: Helper class to get a description of the frame identifiers.

member.summary: Obtain a human description of a frame

member.summary: Fill the hash with the frame descriptors

member.name: T:Id3Lib.FrameFactory
member.remarks: The FrameFactory class creates the correct frame based on the four bytes each frame uses to describe its type, also a description of the frame is added.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.FrameFactory.Build(System.String)
member.summary: Builds a frame base, based on the frame tag type.
member.returns: Frame required for the frame type

member.name: T:Id3Lib.FrameHelper
member.summary: Manage the Parsing or Creation of binary frames.
member.remarks: The FrameHelper is a helper class that receives binary frame from a ID3v1 tag and returns the correct parsed frame or form a frame creates a binary frame that can be saved on an ID3v2 tag in a mp3 file.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.FrameHelper.Build(System.String,System.UInt16,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Create a frame depending on the tag form its binary representation.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.FrameHelper.Make(Id3Lib.Frames.FrameBase,System.UInt16@)
member.summary: Build a binary data frame form the frame object.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.TagManager
member.summary: Handle the loading and saving of ID3 tags.
member.remarks: The FrameManager class manages the conversion of a ID3v2 tag from binary form to a that can be manipulated and saved later again to a binary form.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagManager.Deserialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Load the ID3v2 frames to a binary stream
member.param: Binary stream holding the ID3 Tag
member.returns: Model keeping the ID3 Tag structure

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagManager.Serialize(Id3Lib.TagModel,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Save the ID3v2 frames to a binary stream
member.param: Model keeping the ID3 Tag structure

member.name: T:Id3Lib.TagModel
member.summary: Manages an ID3v2 tag as an object representation.
member.remarks: The FrameModel class represents a ID3v2 tag, it contains a that handles the tag header, an that it is optional and stores the frames.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagModel.IsValid
member.summary: id3v2 tags can not have "no frames"

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagModel.UpdateSize
member.summary: predict the size of the frames on disk (without any padding) by streaming the tag to a dummy stream, which updates the stored size.
member.remarks: Although the the padding is streamed out, the size isn't added on to Header.TagSize

member.name: T:Id3Lib.TagHeader
member.remarks: The Header class manages the first part of the ID3v2 tag that is the first ten bytes of the ID3v1 tag.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.HeaderSize
member.summary: Get the size of the header only.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.Version
member.summary: Get or set ID3v2 major version number.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.Revision
member.summary: Get or set the ID3v2 revision number.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.TagSize
member.summary: Get or set the ID3v2 frames size, i.e. the tag excluding header and footer.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.TagSizeWithHeaderFooter
member.summary: Get the minimum complete ID3v2 tag size, including header and footer but not including any padding.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.Unsync
member.summary: Get or set if un-synchronisation is applied on all frames.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.ExtendedHeader
member.summary: Get or set if the header is followed by an extended header.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.Experimental
member.summary: Get or set if the tag is experimental stage.
member.remarks: This flag shall always be set when the tag is in an experimental stage.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.Footer
member.summary: Get or set if a footer is present at the end of the tag.
member.remarks: Can't be used simultaneously with the frame padding they are mutually exclusive.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.Padding
member.summary: Get if padding is applied on the tag.
member.remarks: Can't be used simultaneously with the frame footer they are mutually exclusive.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHeader.PaddingSize
member.summary: Get or set the padding size, and thus padding.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagHeader.SerializeFooter(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Save corresponding footer into the stream.

member.name: T:Id3Lib.ID3v1
member.remarks: The ID3v1 class can read an ID3v1 frame form a mp3 file returning the and write an ID3v1 form the FrameModel to a mp3 file, it will ignore any fields not supported in ID3v1 tag format.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.ID3v1.FrameModel
member.summary: Get or set the ID3v2 FrameModel.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.ID3v1.Write(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: overwrite or append ID3v1 tag at current location in the stream

member.name: T:Id3Lib.TagHandler
member.summary: Reduce the complexity the tag model to a simple interface

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.FrameModel
member.remarks: it would be nice to remove this one day, and completely encapsulate a private FrameModel object

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.Song
member.summary: Get the title/song name/content description. Song is a synonym of the Title

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.Title
member.summary: Get the title / song name / content description.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.Disc
member.remarks: The 'Part of a set' frame is a numeric string that describes which part of a set the audio came from. This frame is used if the source described in the "TALB" frame is divided into several mediums, e.g. a double CD. The value MAY be extended with a "/" character and a numeric string containing the total number of parts in the set. E.g. "1/2".

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.Length
member.summary: Get the length. the length of the audio file in milliseconds, represented as a numeric string.

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.Lyrics
member.summary: Get the lyrics. (technically: Un-synchronised lyrics/text transcription)

member.name: P:Id3Lib.TagHandler.Picture
member.summary: Get/Set the associated picture as System.Drawing.Image, or null reference

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagHandler.GetFullTextFrame(System.String)
member.summary: Get a full text frame value

member.name: M:Id3Lib.TagHandler.FindFrame(System.String)
member.summary: Find a frame in the model
member.returns: The found frame if found, otherwise null

member.name: T:Id3Lib.Sync
member.summary: Provides static methods for making ID3v2 un-synchronisation
member.remarks:
This helper class takes care of the synchronisation and un-synchronisation needs. The purpose of un-synchronisation is to make the ID3v2 tag as compatible as possible with existing software and hardware.
Synch safe integers are integers that keep its highest byte bit (bit 7) zeroed, making seven bits out of every eight available.

member.name: M:Id3Lib.Sync.Unsafe(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts from a sync-safe integer to a normal integer

member.name: M:Id3Lib.Sync.Safe(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts from a normal integer to a sync-safe integer

member.name: M:Id3Lib.Sync.UnsafeBigEndian(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts from a sync-safe integer to a normal integer

member.name: M:Id3Lib.Sync.SafeBigEndian(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts from a sync-safe integer to a normal integer

member.name: M:Id3Lib.Sync.Unsafe(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Convert a sync-safe stream to a normal stream
member.returns: Number of bytes removed from the original stream

member.name: M:Id3Lib.Sync.Safe(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Convert from an unsafe or normal stream to a sync-safe stream
member.returns: Number of bytes added to the original stream

member.name: T:Id3Lib.TextCode
member.summary: Type of text used in frame
